movie.title: Bachaana
movie.description_intro: A bubbly Indian girl, Aalia, while on vacation in Mauritius, is forced by circumstances to place her faith in a Pakistani cab driver, Vicky, who then takes it upon himself to make Aalia's safe return to India possible.
movie.description_full: A bubbly Indian girl, Aalia, while on vacation in Mauritius, is forced by circumstances to place her faith in a Pakistani cab driver, Vicky, who then takes it upon himself to make Aalia's safe return to India possible.

movies.title: Jump Shot: The Kenny Sailors Story
movies.title_english: Jump Shot: The Kenny Sailors Story
movies.title_long: Jump Shot: The Kenny Sailors Story (2019)
movies.summary: Jump Shot uncovers the inspiring true story of Kenny Sailors, the proclaimed developer of the modern day jump shot in basketball. He defined the game, but only now is he ready to share his thoughts on why the game never defined him.
movies.description_full: Jump Shot uncovers the inspiring true story of Kenny Sailors, the proclaimed developer of the modern day jump shot in basketball. He defined the game, but only now is he ready to share his thoughts on why the game never defined him.
movies.synopsis: Jump Shot uncovers the inspiring true story of Kenny Sailors, the proclaimed developer of the modern day jump shot in basketball. He defined the game, but only now is he ready to share his thoughts on why the game never defined him.

movies.title: Paris Holiday
movies.summary: American comedian Bob Hunter, on a luxury liner to France with French counterpart Fernandel, takes an interest in blonde diplomat Ann McCall while pursued by an even shapelier blonde, the mysterious Zara, who seems to be after something in Bob's possession. But he's only going to France to obtain rights to a new play...so what are Zara and her sinister boss after? The pursuit, amorous and larcenous, continues in Paris and escalates into a full-fledged comedy thriller.
movies.description_full: American comedian Bob Hunter, on a luxury liner to France with French counterpart Fernandel, takes an interest in blonde diplomat Ann McCall while pursued by an even shapelier blonde, the mysterious Zara, who seems to be after something in Bob's possession. movies.title: 21 Up
movies.summary: Director Michael Apted revisits the same group of British-born adults after a seven-year wait. The subjects are interviewed as to the changes that have occurred in their lives during the last seven years.
movies.description_full: Director Michael Apted revisits the same group of British-born adults after a seven-year wait. The subjects are interviewed as to the changes that have occurred in their lives during the last seven years.
movies.synopsis: Director Michael Apted revisits the same group of British-born adults after a seven-year wait. The subjects are interviewed as to the changes that have occurred in their lives during the last seven years.

movies.title: Silmido
movies.summary: Based on a true story of 1968 Korean Republic Army plan to assassinate North Korean president Kim Il-Sung. 31 criminals and death row inmates are recruited into secret training on the island of Silmi; for two years they are subjected to maximum mental and physical abuse before the mission is cancelled and the unit terminated.
